locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Girşim olduğunuz karakterler resimdeki karakterler ile eşleşmedi. Lütfen kontrol ediniz ve yeniden deneyiniz.
Bilinmeyen bir {$name} alan üst veri hatası oluştu.

PKP Open Harvester Systems Version {$version}

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Harvester Systems. Before proceeding, please read the README file included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Harvester Systems, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

Recommended system requirements

  • PHP >= {$phpVersion} (including PHP 5.x); you are currently using PHP {$phpVersion}{$wrongPhpText}
  • MySQL >= 3.23.23 (including MySQL 4.x and 5.x)
  • Apache >= 1.3.2x or >= 2.0.4x or Microsoft IIS 6
  • Operating system: Any OS that supports the above software, including Linux, BSD, Solaris, Mac OS X, Windows

As PKP does not have the resources to test every possible combination of software versions and platforms, no guarantee of correct operation or support is implied.

Changes to these settings can be made after installation by editing the file config.inc.php in the base Open Harvester Systems directory, or using the site administration web interface.

Supported database systems

Open Harvester Systems has currently only been tested on MySQL although other database management systems supported by ADOdb may work (in full or partially). Compatibility reports and/or code patches for alternative DBMSs can be sent to the Open Harvester Systems team.

Pre-Installation Steps

1. The following files and directories (and their contents) must be made writable:

  • config.inc.php is writable (optional): {$writable_config}
  • cache/ is writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ is writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ is writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db is writable: {$writable_db_cache}
WARNING: Your current version of PHP does not meet the minimum requirements for installation. It is recommended to upgrade to a more recent release of PHP.

Open Harvester Systems Version {$version}

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Harvester Systems. Before proceeding, please read the README and UPGRADE files included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Harvester Systems, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

It is strongly recommended that you back up your database, files directory, and Open Harvester Systems installation directory before proceeding.

If you are running in PHP Safe Mode, please ensure that the max_execution_time directive in your php.ini configuration file is set to a high limit. If this or any other time limit (e.g. Apache's "Timeout" directive) is reached and the upgrade process is interrupted, manual intervention will be required.

For complete Unicode (UTF-8) support, select UTF-8 for all character set settings. Note that this support currently requires a MySQL >= 4.1.1 database server. Please also note that full Unicode support requires PHP >= 4.3.0 compiled with support for the mbstring library (enabled by default in most recent PHP installations). You may experience problems using extended character sets if your server does not meet these requirements.

Your server currently supports mbstring: {$supportsMBString}
The primary language to use for this system. Please consult the Open Harvester Systems documentation if you are interested in support for languages not listed here.
Select any additional languages to support in this system. Additional languages can also be installed at any time from the site administration interface.
The encoding to use for data sent to and received from browsers.

The encoding to use for data sent to and received from the database. This should be the same as the client character set. Note that this capability is only supported with MySQL >= 4.1.1. Select "Not applicable" if your database server does not meet these requirements.
The encoding to use for data stored in the database. Note that this capability is only supported with MySQL >= 4.1.1. Select "Not applicable" if your database server does not meet these requirements.
SHA1 is recommended if your system supports it (requires PHP >= 4.3.0).
This user account will become the site administrator and have complete access to the system. Additional user accounts can be created after installation.

Open Harvester Systems requires access to a SQL database to store its data. See the system requirements above for a list of supported databases. In the fields below, provide the settings to be used to connect to the database.

Database drivers listed in brackets do not appear to have the required PHP extension loaded and installation will likely fail if selected.
Any unsupported database drivers listed above are listed solely for academic purposes and are unlikely to work.

Leave the hostname blank to connect using domain sockets instead of over TCP/IP. This is not necessary with MySQL, which will automatically use sockets if "localhost" is entered, but is required with some other database servers such as PostgreSQL.

To use this option your database system must support remote database creation and your user account must have the appropriate permissions to create new databases. If installation fails with this option selected, manually create the database on your server and run the installer again with this option disabled.
The directory to be used for storing uploaded files is required.
The algorithm to use for encrypting user passwords must be selected.
Yönetici hesabı için kullanıcı adı gereklidir.
The administrator username can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, and must begin and end with an alphanumeric character.
Yönetici hesabı için geçerli bir e-posta adresi girilmelidir.
Birden çok değeri virgül ile ayırınız
The directory specified for uploaded files does not exist or is not writable.
The public files directory does not exist or is not writable.
The installation file <tt>dbscripts/xml/install.xml</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
Error parsing the database installation file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
The configuration file <tt>config.inc.php</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
Warning: If installation failed part way through database installation you may need to drop your Open Harvester Systems database or database tables before attempting to reinstall the database.

IMPORTANT!

The installer could not automatically overwrite the configuration file. Before attempting to use the system, please open config.inc.php in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.

Installation of Open Harvester Systems has completed successfully.

To begin using the system, login with the username and password entered on the previous page.

Upgrade of Open Harvester Systems to version {$version} has completed successfully.

Don't forget to set the "installed" setting in your config.inc.php configuration file back to On.
Kullanıcı adı ve şifremi içeren bir onaylama mesajı gönder
Bu site şu halde kullanıcı kaydı kabul etmiyor.
Girmiş olduğunuz şifre yeterince uzun değil.
Fill in this form to register with this journal.
Arşiv yöneticileri indeksleme için arşivlerini gönderebilirler.
The username must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens/underscores.
The password must be at least {$length} characters.
The selected username is already in use by another user.
The username can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, and must begin and end with an alphanumeric character.
The selected email address is already in use by another user.
Invalid username or password. Please try again.
The form was not submitted properly.
Başka dillerde veri girmek için önce dil seçin.
Your account does not currently have any roles. Please choose from the actions below:
Registration as an archive submitter is currently disabled.
Arşiv görseli uygun değil. KAbul edilebilir biçimler GIF, JPG ve PNG.
Are you sure you wish to update the metadata index? This operation may take several minutes, depending on the size of the archive.
Are you sure you wish to delete this archive and all of its records?
The metadata index has been updated. {$recordCount} records are currently indexed.
The metadata index could not be updated. The following error(s) occurred:
Invalid stylesheet format. Accepted format is .css.
Invalid custom logo format. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, and .png.
En az 6 karakter uzunluğunda şifre girmelisiniz.
İndeklenmek üzere herhangi bir kişinin arşivini kayıt etmesine ve göndermesine izin ver.
Gönderileri varsayılan olarak devre dışı bırak ve yöneticisi tarafından etkinleştirilmesine izin ver.
Kullanıcı oturumlarını kapatmak istediğinizden emin misniz? Siz de tekrar giriş yapmak zorunda kalacaksınız.
Düzenlenmiş şablonları temizlemek istediğinizden emin misiniz?

Sorry, you do not have administrative rights over this user. This may be because:
  • The user is a site administrator
  • The user is active in journals you do not manage
This task must be performed by a site administrator.
Please select a role at the top of the page before clicking "Enroll User".

Are you sure you wish to merge the account with the username "{$oldUsername}" into the account with the username "{$newUsername}"? The account with the username "{$oldUsername}" will not exist afterwards. This action is not reversible.
Remove this user from this journal? This action will unenroll the user from all roles within this journal.

Disable this user? This will prevent the user from logging into the system.
You may optionally provide the user with a reason for disabling their account.
Users can be assigned to, or removed from, a role at any point.
Sorry, the requested user does not exist.
Send the user a welcome email containing their username and password.
Please provide at least a last name for the user first.
Require the user to change their password the next time they log in.
Select the users you would like to email by checking the boxes beside their names
Bu sıralama düzenini silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?
Bu sıralama için bir isim gerekli.
Bu sıralama düzeni için geçerli bir tür gereklidir.
Another archive already exists with the specified public archive ID. Please choose another.
This unique identifier can be used in URL-based searches to identify this archive.
Bu site için varsayılan dil olacaktır.
Sitede destek için tüm dilleri seçebilirsiniz. Eğer çoklu dil seçili değilse dil seçim menüsü görüntülenmez ve genişletilmiş dil ayarları düzenlemesi kullanılabilir olmaz.
Bu dili yeniden yüklemek istediğinizden emin misiniz? Bu özelleştirilmiş e-posta şablonları gibi herhangi bir var olan yerel-sipesifik veriyi silecektir.
Bu dili kaldırmak istediğinizden emin misiniz?
Bu sistemde kurulum desteği için herhangi bir ek dil seçiniz. Yeni ek dil ekleme desteği için Açık Harmanlama Sistemleri dokümantasyonuna bakınız.
Kurulum için ek dil kullanılabilir değildir.
Open Harvester Systems configuration settings from <tt>config.inc.php</tt>.
Basic operating system and server software versions. Click on Extended PHP Information to view extended details of this server's PHP configuration.
The configuration file <tt>config.inc.php</tt> does not exist, is not readable, or is invalid.

NOTE!

The system could not automatically overwrite the configuration file. To apply your configuration changes you must open config.inc.php in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.

The contents of your updated configuration are displayed below. To apply the configuration changes you must open <tt>config.inc.php</tt> in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.

Your configuration file has been successfully updated. Please note that if your site no longer functions correctly you may need to manually fix your configuration by editing <tt>config.inc.php</tt> directly.
{$siteTitle} currently has {$recordCount} papers from {$archiveCount} archive(s) indexed.
Click here to add your system to our index.

Welcome to the Public Knowledge Project's metadata archive... To improve the accuracy of searching within the PKP System, authors have been asked to index their work, where applicable, by discipline(s), topics, genre, method, coverage, and sample. This allows you to search for "empirical" versus "historical" studies, for example, under "index terms." You can also view a document's index terms by selecting the complete record from among the search results.

The PKP Open Archives Harvester is a free metadata indexing system developed by the Public Knowledge Project through its federally funded efforts to expand and improve access to research. The PKP OAI Harvester allows you to create a searchable index of the metadata from Open Archives Initiative-compliant archives, such as sites using Open Journal Systems or Open Conference Systems.
The PKP OAI Harvester is currently compatible with versions 1.1 and 2.0 of the OAI Harvesting Protocol.

Arama İpuçları:
  • Arama terimlerinde küçük ve büyük harf farkı yoktur.
  • Sık kullanılan kelimeler göz ardı edilmiştir.
  • Arama sonucunda sadece sorgudaki tüm terimleri içeren makaleler listelenir (yani, VE bağlacı ile bağlananlar).
  • İki sözcüğü içeren makaleleri bulmak için kelimeleri veya ile birleştirin; ör., eğitim veya araştırma
  • Daha kompleks sorgular için parantez kullanın; ör., arşiv ((işletme VEYA yönetim) siyasi DEĞİL)
  • Doğru deyimi araştırmak için tırnak işareti içinde kullanın; ör., "açık erişim yayıncılık"
  • Bir kelimeyi hariç tutmak için önüne - işaret koyun veya DEĞİL yazın; ör. çevrimiçi -politika veya çevrimiçi DEĞİL politika
  • Bir kelime içinde ardışık karakterleri ifade etmek için * sembolünü kullanın; ör., Türk* = "Türkiye", "Türkler", "Türklerin" vb. terimlerinin bulunmasını sağlar.
Herhangi bir arama terimi girilmedi. En azından bir arama terimi girmelisiniz.
Reloaded XML help mapping file {$filename} in search of {$id}.
No matching help topics were found.
This category contains general-purpose plugins that are not better suited to other categories.
Block Plugins are pluggable UI components, such as the various sidebar tools.
This category contains plugins that implement various harvesting protocols such as OAI.
This category contains plugins that process harvested data before it is added to the Open Harvester Systems repository in its native metadata format.
This category contains plugins that process harvested data after it has been added to the Open Harvester Systems repository in its native metadata format but before it is indexed for searching.
This category contains plugins that implement various metadata formats.
Theme Plugins can be used to change the system's appearance.

Plugin was not successfully copied. This may be a permissions problem. Please make sure that the web server is able to write to the plugins directory (including subdirectories) but don't forget to secure it again later.
Are you sure you wish to delete this plugin from the system?
By clicking delete, you will delete the plugin from the server's file system.

Plugin could not be deleted from the file system. This may be a permissions problem. Please make sure that the web server is able to write to the plugins directory (including subdirectories) but don't forget to secure it again later.

This page allows the Administrator to review and potentially configure the plugins that are currently installed. Plugins are divided into categories, according to their function. The categories are listed below, and within each category, its current set of plugins.
This form allows you to upload and install a new plugin. Please ensure the plugin is compressed as a .tar.gz file.
Plugin already exists, and is newer or equal to installed version
Plugin already exists, and is older or equal to the installed version
The uploaded plugin archive does not contain a folder that corresponds to the plugin name.
The uploaded plugin does not fit the category of the upgraded plugin.
The version.xml in the uploaded plugin contains a plugin name that does not fit the name of the upgraded plugin.
Plugin does not exist. Please Install instead
Plugin already exists, but is newer than installed version. Please upgrade instead
The tar command is not available. Please correctly configure it in your "config.inc.php".
This form allows you to upgrade a plugin. Please ensure the plugin is compressed as a .tar.gz file.
Eklenti dizininde version.xml geçersiz veri içeriyor.

Open Harvester Systems allows the Administrator to designate which Reading Tools will be used for each archive. In addition, a site-wide set of Reading Tools can be provided as a default. Please choose the context for which you wish to configure the Reading Tools.
Enter Settings to enable the RT or change the selected version.
Please select the version of the Reading Tools that best matches the requirements of this archive.
Bibliographic info (Displays the citation of an article in standard format, with support for the following citation management software: EndNote, Reference Manager, and ProCite)
Indexing info (Displays an item's indexing information generated by the author and the system)
See supplementary files (Displays a list of any supplementary files that the author included with an item)
Go to print version (Takes reader to a printer-friendly version of an item)
About the author (Displays the bio statements entered by the author)
Definition of terms (Enables readers to double-click on any word in an item and send the word to a dictionary)
Add comment to item (Enables readers to post comments). Reader Comments must be enabled in Setup
Email the author (Takes readers to an email template with the author's email)
Send item to colleague (Takes readers to an email template with the title of item as its subject)
Are you sure you wish to irreversibly restore all versions to their defaults? If so, you will need to choose an active Version on the Settings page.
Are you sure you wish to delete this Version and all associated Contexts and Searches?
Are you sure you wish to delete this Context and all associated Searches?
Use author names as default search terms and describe the context as a search for citations to the article.
Use author names as default search terms to enable users to find other works by the authors for this item (e.g., for an "Other Works" context)
Use geographical indexing data as default search terms.
Use the word highlighted by the reader as default search term or be left blank if none has been selected for this item (e.g., for a "Definition of terms" context).
Bu aramayı silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?

Possibly invalid URLs for search sites are displayed below.
You should manually verify any URLs marked as invalid, as this test is not 100% accurate.
Validation may fail on search URLs that require posted form data.

The search terms can be altered or deleted by the reader; two or three short, precise terms or phrases produced the best Boolean (AND) searches. To learn more about the resources searched, click on ABOUT. These resources have been selected for their relevance and open (free) access to all or part of their contents.

Double click on any word in the text and it will appear in the Word-to-Define box. You can also type or paste a word into the box. Then use the search function to find a definition for the word. To learn more about the resource searched, click on the information symbol. These resources have been selected because of their relevance and their open (free) access to all or part of their contents.

For items with more than one author, leave all names checked to search for similarly co-authored work, or search one at a time by checking only a single name. To learn more about the resource searched, click on the information symbol. These resources have been selected because of their relevance and their open (free) access to all or part of their contents.

If the article is indexed in Google Scholar, it may be accompanied by a "Cited by X" link, which leads to a list of works that cite it. As well, Google Scholar will list all items quoting the title and author. To access online resources that are only available through your research library, you may be able to go to Scholar Preferences in Google Scholar and activate the Library Links for your institution.
Kullanıcı değil misiniz? Bu siteye kayıt olunuz.

For security reasons, this system emails a reset password to registered users, rather than recalling the current password.

Enter your email address below to reset your password. A confirmation will be sent to this email address.
Invalid profile image format or image too big. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png, and the image must not exceed 150x150 pixels.
The specified URL is not valid. Please double-check the URL and try again. (Hint: Try adding http:// to the beginning of the URL.)
Leave the password fields blank to keep the current password.
Enter your current and new passwords below to change the password for your account.
